terms.intro_text: Our goal is to connect DJs, music producers, and Spanish-speaking audio professionals to boost their careers, share knowledge, and access exclusive tools. By joining my.portaldj.pro, you become part of a community designed to exchange ideas, access educational and musical content (Music Pool & Academy), and optimize your workflow with advanced technology (AI Assistant).
terms.section_1_text: By clicking "Join", "Register", or by using our services, you agree to enter into a legally binding contract with Portal DJ (hereinafter "we" or "the Platform").
terms.section_1_warning: If you do not agree with this Contract ("Terms of Use") or our Privacy Policy, do not access or use our services.
terms.section_1_1_text: This contract applies to the use of my.portaldj.pro and integrated services including:
terms.section_1_1_profile_desc: Display of portfolio, technical "Rider" (equipment), and calendar.
terms.section_1_1_pool_desc: Access to music downloads and training courses.
terms.section_1_1_restriction_desc: The Music Pool service is NOT a resource for the general music consumer (mass public), and the resources described herein are NOT available to the general public under any circumstances.
terms.section_1_1_verification_desc: Portal DJ reserves the right to request accreditation (active social media, portfolio, technical rider) to verify professional status before or after granting access.
terms.section_1_1_ai_desc: Artificial intelligence tools for technical support.
terms.section_1_2_members_desc: Registered users who have created an account.
terms.section_1_2_visitors_desc: Users who browse without registering (with limited access). You must be at least 16 years old to use our services. If you are under 18, you guarantee that you have the supervision of a legal guardian to perform transactions (purchases of courses or subscriptions).
terms.section_2_1_text: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your password. Since we offer access to licensed music downloads (Music Pool), sharing your account is strictly prohibited.
terms.section_2_1_detection: We detect simultaneous accesses from different IPs; this may lead to the immediate suspension of the account without the right to a refund.
terms.section_2_2_intro: If you purchase a subscription (Monthly/Annual) or an individual course:
terms.section_2_2_payments_desc: You agree to honor your payment obligations and authorize the storage of your billing information through our secure payment processors.
terms.section_2_2_renewal_desc: Music Pool subscriptions renew automatically unless canceled before the cutoff date.
terms.section_2_2_refunds_desc: Due to the digital nature of the products (music downloads and immediate access to courses), we do not offer refunds once content has been downloaded or more than 10% of a course has been consumed, except for verifiable technical failures of the platform.
terms.section_3_1_title: 3.1 Your License over your Content (Professional Profile)
terms.section_3_1_text: You own the information you upload to your profile (photos of your events, biography, equipment list). However, you grant us a non-exclusive license to display, distribute, and promote your profile within the platform (e.g., "DJ of the Week", "Profile Finder", "Home Screen", "Global Feed").
terms.section_3_1_veracity_desc: You commit that your profile information (experience, equipment you own) is real. Portal DJ is not responsible for failed bookings based on false information provided by the user.
terms.section_3_2_title: 3.2 Music Pool & Academy (Intellectual Property of Portal DJ)
terms.section_3_2_text: All downloadable content from the Music Pool (Edits, Remixes, Intros) and educational material from the Academy is the property of Portal DJ or its licensors.
terms.section_3_2_1_text: Portal DJ (my.portaldj.pro) is an exclusive service for DJs. All audio files (MP3, WAV), videos, and tools available in the Music Pool are solely for promotional use.
terms.section_3_2_1_commercial_desc: Files are not for individual sale. Your subscription covers curation service, hosting, and bandwidth, not the purchase of the intellectual property of the music.
terms.section_3_2_1_property_desc: You acknowledge that the intellectual property of the works belongs to their respective authors, record labels, and rights holders.
terms.section_3_2_2_text: By accepting these conditions and downloading content from our Music Pool, you accept and warrant that you have the respective permissions from your country or jurisdiction to publicly reproduce the downloaded musical files.
terms.section_3_2_2_liability_desc: Portal DJ is not responsible for the payment of public performance rights (such as SCD or PROFOVI in Chile, ASCAP/BMI in the US, or their local counterparts). It is your sole responsibility to ensure that the venue (club, bar, radio) where you use this promotional material has valid licenses.
terms.section_3_2_2_resale_desc: It is strictly prohibited to resell, redistribute, upload to other servers, or share audio files ("Leaking") with third parties who do not have an active subscription.
terms.section_3_3_text: Portal DJ provides an AI Assistant to solve technical questions about equipment and software.
terms.section_3_3_nature_desc: You understand that this service is an automated tool and may make errors ("hallucinations").
terms.section_3_3_liability_desc: Portal DJ is not responsible for hardware damage, loss of music libraries, or software corruption derived from blindly following AI Assistant instructions. We always recommend verifying critical instructions with the official support of your equipment's brand.
terms.section_4_title: 4. Warranty Disclaimer and Limitation of Liability
terms.section_4_disclaimer: TO THE EXTENT PERMITTED BY CHILEAN LAW, PORTAL DJ DOES NOT GUARANTEE THAT THE SERVICES WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE. THE SERVICES (INCLUDING THE MUSIC POOL AND AI ASSISTANT) ARE OFFERED "AS IS".
terms.section_4_text: Portal DJ will not be responsible for loss of business opportunities (e.g., if the site goes down just before you need to download music for an event), loss of data, or indirect damages derived from the use of the platform.
terms.section_4_1_intro: It is prohibited to use the Site or any Content to:
terms.section_4_1_p1: Use any "deep-link", "page-scrape", "robot", "spider", or other automatic device, program, algorithm, or methodology, or any similar or equivalent manual process, to access, acquire, copy, or monitor any part of the Site or any Content.
terms.section_4_1_p2: Reproduce or circumvent in any way the navigational structure or presentation of the Site to obtain material or information not intentionally available through the standard user interface.
terms.section_4_2_intro: You agree not to use any device, software, or routine to interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Site, or with any other person's use of the Site. In addition, it is prohibited to:
terms.section_4_2_p1: Perform reverse lookups, trace or attempt to trace any information on any other user, visitor to the site, or member of Portal DJ.
terms.section_4_2_p2: Exploit the site or any service available to reveal information other than your own personal information (doxing).
terms.section_5_1_p1: Use your real name or recognized stage name.
terms.section_5_1_p2: Maintain a professional and respectful tone in Academy forums and comments.
terms.section_5_2_title: 5.2 What you MUST NOT do (Grounds for immediate expulsion)
terms.section_5_2_piracy_desc: Downloading music from the Music Pool and sharing it in Telegram groups, WhatsApp, or other forums.
terms.section_5_2_scraping_desc: Using automated software to extract data from other DJs or mass download site content.
terms.section_5_2_reverse_desc: Attempting to copy the source code of our AI Assistant or platform.
terms.section_5_2_offensive_desc: Publishing content that incites hatred, discrimination, or harassment towards other members.
terms.section_6_text: Any dispute related to this contract will be governed by the laws of the Republic of Chile. You agree to submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of the city of Santiago, Chile, to resolve any legal conflict.
terms.section_6_prohibition: You may not use the Site for any purpose that is illegal or prohibited by these Terms of Use. Any activity detected that suggests mass redistribution of our material (piracy/leaking) or attempt to breach our security will be reported to competent authorities and copyright management organizations.
terms.section_7_text: If you have questions about these terms or detect a copyright infringement on the platform, contact us at:
legal_terms_conduct: 2. Conduct: Harassment, illegal content, or copyright infringement is not allowed. Portal DJ is a professional community.
legal_privacy_intro: Your privacy is important to us. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information.
legal_privacy_collection: We collect information you provide directly (profile, email) and automatic usage data.
legal_privacy_usage: We use your data to connect you with other users, improve the platform, and send you important notifications.
legal_cookies_intro: We use cookies to improve your experience on Portal DJ. By using our site, you agree to the use of cookies in accordance with this policy.
legal_cookies_types: We use essential cookies for site operation, analytics cookies to understand usage, and functionality cookies.
